simulator.framework

Class Elevator

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.framework.Elevator

  • public class Elevator
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides command-line interface to and instantiates all objects for the Elevator simulation.

    • Method Detail

      • getFastElevatorSpeed

        public static double getFastElevatorSpeed()
        Returns:
        the "FAST" elevator speed, as set by the -fs commandline option

      • getIgnoreLeveling

        public static boolean getIgnoreLeveling()
        Returns:
        True if the passengers should ignore the board/entering leveling requirement, false otherwise

      • hasLanding

        public static boolean hasLanding(int floor,
                 Hallway hallway)
        Parameters:
        floor - 1-indexed floor number
        hallway - hallway
        Returns:
        True if the elevator has a landing at that floor and hallway

      • printSmallUsage

        Short usage for when there are commandline errors

      • log

        static void log(java.lang.Object... msg)

      • printFullUsage

        public static void printFullUsage()
        Complete command-line reference. It is important that this be kept in sync with the commandline options parser and the message, configuration, fault, and passenger file parsers. This is the primary reference for using the simulator.
